title: Socialism's Fatal Flaw - Intellectual Arrogance (re Pirsig's MOQ)
description:
Socialism is advanced in the sense that it is a purely intellectual vision of society. But that's why it won't work. Robert Pirsig addresses this in Lila, and it sounds a lot like Ken Wilber

Wilber: http://www.kenwilber.com/home/landing/index.html

MOQ: MOQ.org
